articles.title: Ram Charan makes a splash on Good Morning America. See pics - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Telugu star Ram Charan was in New York as a guest on Good Morning America. He has been promoting his film RRR ahead of the Oscars.
articles.content: Actor Ram Charan, who is in the US ahead of the Academy Awards 2023, was invited to be part of popular talk show Good Morning America in New York. As Ram Charan arrived for the show, he was mobbed by… [+2041 chars]

articles.title: What is Skin-Rotting Zombie Drug That Has Hit Major US Cities? Check Symptoms and Other Details Here - Zee News
articles.description: A new street drug that is being marketed in Philadelphia, the epicentre of Americas opioid crisis, has doctors baffled. Public health experts are disturbed by its spread and worry about the horrific wounds it causes in its users bodies.

articles.title: Guns N’ Roses plots extensive 2023 world tour with 4 Canadian dates - Global News
articles.description: Guns N' Roses will bookend the North American leg of their 2023 tour with shows in Moncton and Vancouver.
articles.content:
Guns N’ Roses is hitting the road in 2023, mapping out an extensive, five-month world tour that will hit stadiums, arenas and festivals around the world, including multiple shows in Canada.
